title: BBC Local Live: Nottinghamshire on Friday 16 December 2016 - BBC News
summary: m1 re-opens after being shut for hours .
murder investigation launched after woman 's death in derbyshire village .
witnesses recall bloody scene in borrowash .
police confirm man , 44 , died on m1 .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from our updates today .
join us again for news across nottinghamshire on monday .

documents.title: m1 southbound reopens - confirmed
text: i 've just had clarification from notts police that the southbound side is open but it 'll take a while for the traffic to clear .
although with traffic being less busy at this time of night hopefully that should n't take too long .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sneinton murder : man charged
text: in other news , a man has been charged with murder after the death of a man in sneinton .
a 38-year-old , who 's been formally identified as junior fuller , was found with stab wounds to his chest in mill view close on sunday and later died from his injuries .
dwayne johnson , 29 , from the meadows was arrested yesterday and has now been charged with murder .
he 's due to appear at nottingham magistrates ' court tomorrow .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: m1 southbound confusion
text: yet again a bit of confusion over the m1 .
notts police have told us both sides have now re-opened .
highways cameras seem to suggest otherwise .
our cctv still shows southbound traffic being diverted off the m1 at j26
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingpolice confirm murder investigation launched
text: police have confirmed they 've launched a murder investigation into the death of a 38-year-old woman found injured at a house in borrowash ,
they were called to the village this morning after a 22-year-old man who had been injured raised the alarm .
he 's now being treated in hospital .
thirty minutes later a 44-year-old man died after a collision with a lorry on the southbound side of the m1 between junctions 26 and 25 .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: m1 fully re-opens
text: the m1 has reopened in both directions between junctions 25 and 26 .
police are asking people to return to their vehicles if they 've left them on the carriageway .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northbound carriageway reopens
text: the southbound carriageway is estimated to re-open by 21:30 .
m1 n/b has reopened btwn j25 + j26 following an earlier @ twitterid incident , with 1 lane closed at scene .
s/b carriageway remains closed .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'just a mess ' - witnesses recall bloody scene in borrowash
text: witnesses louise winson and michael nightingale have been talking about what they saw in the aftermath of what appears to have been a bloody attack in borrowash .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: body on the m1
text: some more information from one of bbc east midlands today 's cameramen .
he was at the scene of the m1 incident earlier and said he saw a body on the carriageway .
police have yet to confirm whether someone died in the incident .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police team searches motorway
text: bradd farnsworth took this showing police officers on the m1 .
it was taken at trowell services .
we 've not had any updates from derbyshire police for a few hours now .
all we know so far is a woman died in borrowash at 11:00
this is being linked to an incident on the m1 , which has closed the motorway in both directions .
police currently searching the m1 southbound carriage way at trowell services due to a fatal accident # m1 # police

can we use your on the bbc news website please with credit ?
yes that 's completely fine : )
thanks .
where was the pic taken ?
trowell services southbound
thanks .
would you be able to speak to one of my colleagues at bbc news here in nottingham ?
alex is on 0115 9021847 .
yes will call now
hi bradd , can we use your at trowell services please with credit ?
thanks .
yes that 's great
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: borrowash : 'he had stab wounds over his face '
text: michael nightingale , a neighbour from station road , said : `` i have lived here for ten years and i have never seen anything like this .
i do n't really know what 's gone off .
`` but he ran into the flower shop and he had stab wounds over his face , the young lad .
he ran over the road - that 's where they wrapped him up .
he was shouting help me , help me . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: trapped traffic being released
text: work to release trapped traffic continues within # m1 j25 - j26 both ways , road remains closed .
please follow @ twitterid instructions .

author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: very long tailbacks into city
text: a610 nuthall road outbound backed up from m1 j26 to gregory boulevard junction .
some exit blocking of western blvd due to standing traffic .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: borrowash : neighbour 'saw young lad on ground '
text: a neighbour from station road said `` coming home at just gone 11:00 and i saw the police wrapping up a young lad in tin foil he was on the ground , so i drove down into my drive and then a police van turned up and cordoned off the house . ''
author: Jack Maclaren
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: m1 looking ghostly quiet
text: this is from the camera just south of trowell services .

BBC Local Live

text: cars on the m1 southbound have begun turning around .
one driver said : `` police were at the roundabout directing people off junction 26 . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: confirmed : m1 northbound side still closed
text: a definitive answer as to whether the m1 northbound is shut at last .
it 's still closed but the trapped traffic is being released , a highways england spokesman has told us .
he said they will let us know when the carriageway does re-open .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'pregnant and trapped in traffic '
text: you 've been sharing your stories of being trapped in the m1 traffic on facebook .
lucy webster wrote : `` 8 months pregnant and been sat on m1 since 1 is not good just been shouting at a lorry driver for not letting us get on to hard shoulder to have a wee ''
jo dianthus twells said : `` a6002 is chocker , taken us 40 mins to get from ikea to the stella turn off . ''
alan buxey simply said : `` long journey home tonight ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: is the m1 northbound open ?
text: truth is we 're not sure .
derbyshire police say no but the highways england traffic cameras tell a different story
the side nearest to the camera is the northbound side .
if you can safely let us know , email us .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: m1 northbound traffic released
text: update : the n/b carriageway of the # m1 is not open as previously stated ; police are releasing traffic however .
apologies for the confusion .
how long before it reopens ?
we still ca n't give you a precise time but we 're hopeful that it will re-open sooner than expected .
`` sooner than expected '' has now passed , when will it open now , if it 's when expected can you tell me exactly what time that is ?
no we can not .
it 's a major incident , please be patient .
not even a little hint then , bit harsh , it is xmas after all .
i 'm sure my fellow m1'ers would really appreciate it
we 'd like to give you an exact time but there are too many factors involved which prevent us from giving you that .
any news on when northbound will open ?
still no precise time but it 's estimated to be sooner rather than later .
is it worth pulling over and waiting for it to re open ?
if you 're stuck in it , we 're afraid you 'll have to be patient .
we ca n't offer a precise time when it will re-open .
are the services open ?
that 's actually our destination we are meeting someone there .
who are stuck coming the other way haha
the services are open but do not abandon your vehicle on the hard shoulder & be tempted to walk .
we wo n't do n't worry , we are still 6 miles away anyway
any updates on the m1 please
we 've tweeted and re-tweeted the latest .
check @ twitterid from this point .
definitely dropped a clanger with the 'sooner than expected ' line
it 's still the case , it 's just that initially the feeling was this could be a much lengthy process than it already is .
what about southbound ?
southbound is likely to be closed for some time .
is j26 northbound open ?
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

text: big police presence here in borrowash

Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: borrowash death and m1 closure : recap
text: a reminder of what 's happened so far .
police said they were called to borrowash after reports a woman had been injured .
she later died .
the man who made the call at about 11:00 was injured and is recovering in hospital .
they 've said it 's believed to be linked to the closure of the m1 at about 11:30 , when a pedestrian and a vehicle collided .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

text: police have cordoned off a house in station road , borrowash .
this is believed to be where a woman was injured who later died .
author: Dave Wade

please follow instructions from # trafficofficers + @ twitterid

hopefully you 'll be released soon .

BBC Local Live

documents.title: m1 northbound side reopens
text: northbound side is moving , according to derbyshire police .
latest travel info here .
@ twitterid stuck in the m1 southbound tromwell traffic .
northbound traffic now moving .
any update on southbound if possible ?
as the incident happened on the s/b carriageway we have no estimated time of re-opening yet .
thanks
not moving here !
can u confirm if it 's starting to move on the northbound ?
we can confirm that the northbound carriageway is now moving .
excellent news - maybe put it on the radio so all can get back in their cars !
thanks
author: Alex Smith
BBC News Online

documents.title: closure of both sides 'standard '
text: derbyshire police said it 's standard practice to close both sides of the motorway when something on this scale happens .
officers dealing with incidents in # borrowash and on the # m1 believe them to be linked .
come on why is the northbound still stopped ?
loads of cops there and nobody man enough to open one lane !
it 's closed due to a major incident .
it 's standard practise for this to happen during an investigation of this scale
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: '40 police at scene ' on m1
text: a text to bbc radio nottingham earlier said there were `` easily 40 police '' at the scene on the m1 .

text: are they not letting vehicles off at j25 or j26 rt @ twitterid dog walker spotted on the # m1 during the closure between # trowell service

no idea what 's going on or how much longer til we move .

text: a610 nuthall road and a65144 western boulevard very slow moving and congested due to extra traffic from motorway closure .

documents.title: man also injured in borrowash incident
text: a man who called police at about 11:00 about was also injured .
he 's recovering in hospital , police say .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingm1 'may be linked to woman 's death '
text: police have said the m1 closure could be linked to the death of a woman in borrowash , derbyshire , this morning .
officers were called to an address in the village after reports a woman had been injured .

a derbyshire police spokesman said : `` the incidents may be linked to a collision involving a vehicle and a pedestrian on the southbound side of the m1 near trowell services , which happened at about 11:30 . ''
both carriageways of the motorway remain closed .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: m1 clear 'in two hours '
text: the highways agency is now giving an estimated time of between 15:45 and 16:00 for the motorway to reopen .
the time keeps increasing so i 'd take that as a conservative estimate .
they 're also saying there are delays of 40 mins but i 'd say that too should be taken with a pinch of salt if you 're heading that way .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

text: word is spreading

BBC Local Live

( 2/2 ) who is now in the care of @ twitterid # notjustfires # 999family

BBC Local Live

documents.title: 115 vacancies for carers in county
text: the news about patients `` blocking beds '' in notts because they 're unable to get appropriate care outside of hospital comes at a time when almost a quarter of the homecare worker posts at the county council are empty .
there are 115 vacancies across the four agencies used by the county council .

but head of adult social care in nottinghamshire , david pearson , has said moving elderly people swiftly out of hospital is a major focus for them and their current vacancies do n't slow up that process .
`` where there is a gap we do contract with other providers on an individual basis , where they meet our quality criteria , '' he said .
`` so nobody is going without care but clearly what we want to do is attract more people to what is a fantastic role , and a rewarding career choice . ''
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : a1 crash
text: crews from # retford and # worksop are currently dealing with a collison on the # a1 northbound at # elkesley .
this involves a car and a lorry .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: bed blocking at notts hospitals
text: it 's a big problem facing our modern world - we 're living longer but there 's less government money to look after us .
it seems that 's become clear here in nottinghamshire in the last fortnight with black alerts at nottingham 's main hospitals and one at king 's mill .
it 's down to so-called bed blocking - put simply the hospitals are full .
nottinghamshire 's hospital trust has told the bbc on average 55 patients a day were ready to leave last month but care after their discharge could n't be organised .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your cracking moon gromit
text: did you see the massive moon last night ?
some of our weather watchers got some excellent snaps .
we do n't have to doubt anymore that the moon is in fact made from cheese , thanks to this one from stapleford .
and here 's how it looked from long eaton :
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: 'we were a bit sad but it 's just a game '
text: iris 's letter could have gone anywhere in the city but amazingly it was delivered to the famous louvre museum - home of the mona lisa .
they wrote : `` we are the reception at the museum of the louvre and we are pleased to receive your letter and here are some answers to your questions
just brilliant .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: iris asks french probing questions
text: iris said she wrote to paris `` just because i like paris and i like the eiffel tower and i had a few questions to ask them '' .
and here are those questions
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: girl 's letter to 'anyone in paris ' gets a special reply
text: you might have seen a story in the news recently about a couple who received a letter addressed to `` somewhere near the sea in suffolk '' .
well this is even better - one little girl from west bridgford who was interested in finding out about paris went a step further .
eight-year-old , iris corbett , simply wrote `` somewhere in paris , any house '' on her envelope - and guess what ?
it arrived !
and even better it was received by the louvre museum who wrote back , answering all her questions .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
text: here are today 's top stories so far
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : a6 closed
text: more problems around the a453/m1 junction - the a6 is now closed southbound between kegworth and packington hill because of the earlier accident there .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: magpies : sheridan and crossley 'right men for job '
text: notts county 's assistant manager , mark crossley , has said chairman ray trew still believes that he and john sheridan ( are the right men to turn the magpies ' fortunes around .
notts have lost five league games in a row and sit 20th in league two .
crossley has admitted , though , that trew has let them know how unhappy he is with recent results .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: woman 's fire death 'not sus
text: police have told us an 80-year-old woman died in a house in old basford where a fire broke out on wednesday morning .
after an investigation , they established the woman died before the small fire in the kitchen of the property in wilton terrace .
her death is not being treated as sus they said , and the fire , which was out on arrival , started accidentally .
the coroner has been informed and a post mortem examination is due to take place .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: east midlands weather forecast
text: here 's how it 's looking today
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: buses could improve city 's dirty air
text: electric buses mean lower operating costs for the suppliers but more importantly cleaner air in the city .
air pollution in nottingham has been an issue for some time with the world health organisation putting it in their 11 dirtiest cities earlier this year .
the council hopes the new cleaner buses will help to change that .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: city to have one of europe 's biggest electric bus fleets
text: first this morning some potentially good news for the air in nottingham .
the city 's set to have one of the largest electric bus fleets in europe .
thirteen new fully electric single-deckers - to go with the 45 already in service - are being unveiled by the city council .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : a453 lanes closed
text: two lanes are closed on the a453 southbound at kegworth because of recovery work after an earlier accident .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live news coverage
text: two reasons to celebrate this morning : it 's friday and it 's christmas jumper day .
here 's bbc news online 's anna allatt .
her jumper actually plays jingle bells .
incredible effort .
send me of your jumpers today via email , twitter and facebook .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live
